title: FGO Social Sport Network by Asen Sokolov
descr: Web developer based in Dubai, UAE. With more than 8 year experience and more than 100 project behind his back as a part of Xec-studio family.

generalInfo:
FGO is a community of young people who believes that regular sport will improve the people's lives. They are motivated to help as many people as possible to play football and have fun.

The mission of the platform is to make the whole proces of organizing football games with friends an easy task and integrate fun elements with useful statistic and features and all this wrapped in very nice and user friendly design.
typographyDescr: Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop: concept, corp ID and sport social network for football enthusiasts.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: As a part of FGO Team I had the task to create a user oriented design with easy to understand flow. In order to create the best possible user experience I used popular design technics to focus user attention to important information. After many hours of work we manage to launch the product in the begining of April 2016. In the first month we had more than 200 active users and all of them use the platform to organize their football meetings.

So what are you waiting for? Get involved and have some fun!

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: Asen Sokolov, Yosif Yosifov and Vasil Trifonov
